vernac_cmds: Require Import Bool Arith Max List.
Inductive value : Type := | c_capply : constructor -> list value -> value.
Inductive term : Type := | var : variable -> term | capply : constructor -> list term -> term | fapply : function -> list term -> term.
Inductive pattern : Type := | p_var : variable -> pattern | p_capply : constructor -> list pattern -> pattern.
Inductive rule : Type := | rule_intro : function -> list pattern -> term -> rule.
Lemma value_ind2_gen : forall (P : value -> Type)(Q : list value -> Type), Q nil -> (forall v l, P v -> Q l -> Q (v :: l)) -> (forall c l, Q l -> P (c_capply c l)) -> forall v, P v.
fix H1 6; intros P Q H2 H3 H4 [c l]; apply H4; revert l; fix H5 1; intros [ | v l].

Lemma term_ind2_gen : forall (P : term -> Prop)(Q : list term -> Prop), Q nil -> (forall t l, P t -> Q l -> Q (t :: l)) -> (forall x, P (var x)) -> (forall c l, Q l -> P (capply c l)) -> (forall f l, Q l -> P (fapply f l)) -> forall t, P t.
fix H1 8; intros P Q H2 H3 H4 H5 H6 [ x | c l | f l ].
apply H5; revert l; fix H7 1; intros [ | t l].
apply H6; revert l; fix H7 1; intros [ | t l].

Lemma term_ind2 : forall (P : term -> Prop), (forall x, P (var x)) -> (forall c l, (forall t, In t l -> P t) -> P (capply c l)) -> (forall f l, (forall t, In t l -> P t) -> P (fapply f l)) -> forall t, P t.
intros P H1 H2 H3 t.
apply term_ind2_gen with (Q := fun l => forall t, In t l -> P t); simpl; try tauto.
clear H1 H2 H3 t; intros t1 l H1 H2 t2 [H3 | H3].

Lemma pattern_ind2_gen : forall (P : pattern -> Prop)(Q : list pattern -> Prop), Q nil -> (forall p l, P p -> Q l -> Q (p :: l)) -> (forall x, P (p_var x)) -> (forall c l, Q l -> P (p_capply c l)) -> forall p, P p.
fix H1 7; intros P Q H2 H3 H4 H5 [ x | c l ].
apply H5; revert l; fix H6 1; intros [ | p l].
Lemma pattern_ind2 : forall (P : pattern -> Prop), (forall x, P (p_var x)) -> (forall c l, (forall p, In p l -> P p) -> P (p_capply c l)) -> forall p, P p.
apply pattern_ind2_gen with (Q := fun l => forall p, In p l -> P p); simpl; try tauto.
clear H1 H2 p; intros p1 l H1 H2 p2 [H3 | H3].
Definition variable_beq (x1 x2 : variable) : bool := if variable_eq_dec x1 x2 then true else false.
Lemma variable_beq_eq : forall x1 x2, variable_beq x1 x2 = true <-> x1 = x2.
split; intro H; destruct (variable_eq_dec x1 x2); [ trivial | discriminate | trivial | tauto ].
Definition function_beq (x1 x2 : function) : bool := if function_eq_dec x1 x2 then true else false.
Lemma function_beq_eq : forall x1 x2, function_beq x1 x2 = true <-> x1 = x2.
split; intro H; destruct (function_eq_dec x1 x2); [ trivial | discriminate | trivial | tauto ].
Definition constructor_beq (x1 x2 : constructor) : bool := if constructor_eq_dec x1 x2 then true else false.
Lemma constructor_beq_eq : forall x1 x2, constructor_beq x1 x2 = true <-> x1 = x2.
split; intro H; destruct (constructor_eq_dec x1 x2); [ trivial | discriminate | trivial | tauto ].
Fixpoint value_beq (v1 v2 : value) : bool := match v1, v2 with | c_capply c lv, c_capply c' lv' => constructor_beq c c' && list_beq _ value_beq lv lv' end.
Lemma value_ind2 : forall (P : value -> Prop), (forall c l, (forall v, In v l -> P v) -> P (c_capply c l)) -> forall v, P v.
apply value_ind2_gen with (Q := fun l => forall v, In v l -> P v); simpl; try tauto.
clear H1 v; intros v1 l H1 H2 v2 [H3 | H3].
Lemma value_beq_eq v1 v2 : value_beq v1 v2 = true <-> v1 = v2.
induction v1 as [ c1 lv1 IH ] using value_ind2; simpl; intros [ c2 lv2 ].

Fixpoint term_beq (t1 t2 : term) : bool := match t1, t2 with | var x, var x' => variable_beq x x' | capply c lt, capply c' lt' => constructor_beq c c' && list_beq _ term_beq lt lt' | fapply f lt, fapply f' lt' => function_beq f f' && list_beq _ term_beq lt lt' | _, _ => false end.
Lemma term_beq_eq t1 t2 : term_beq t1 t2 = true <-> t1 = t2.
induction t1 as [ x1 | c1 lt1 IH | f1 lt1 IH ] using term_ind2; simpl; intros [ x2 | c2 lt2 | f2 lt2 ]; try (split; congruence).
Fixpoint pattern_from_value (v : value) : pattern := match v with | c_capply c lv => p_capply c (map pattern_from_value lv) end.
Fixpoint term_from_value (v : value) : term := match v with | c_capply c lc => capply c (map term_from_value lc) end.
Lemma term_from_value_not_var : forall v x, ~ term_from_value v = var x.
intros v x; destruct v; simpl; congruence.
Lemma term_from_value_not_fapply : forall v f lt, ~ term_from_value v = fapply f lt.
intros v x; destruct v; simpl; congruence.
Lemma term_from_value_injective (v v': value) : term_from_value v = term_from_value v' -> v = v'.
revert v'; induction v as [ c lv IH ] using value_ind2; intros v' Heq.
revert lv' Heqlv Hlen IH; induction lv as [ | v lv IH' ]; intros lv' Heqlv Hlen IH; destruct lv' as [ | v' lv']; [ trivial | inversion Hlen | inversion Hlen | ].
Fixpoint term_from_pattern (p : pattern) : term := match p with | p_var v => var v | p_capply c lp => capply c (map term_from_pattern lp) end.
Lemma term_from_pattern_not_fapply : forall v f lt, ~ term_from_pattern v = fapply f lt.
intros v x; destruct v; simpl; congruence.
Fixpoint term_value (t: term) : Prop := match t with | capply _ lt => andl (map term_value lt) | _ => False end.
Lemma term_value_eqv (t: term) : term_value t <-> exists (v: value), t = term_from_value v.
induction t as [ | c lt IH | ] using term_ind2.
intros Himp; destruct Himp as [ v Himp ]; destruct v; discriminate.
assert (exists lv, Forall2 (fun t v => t = term_from_value v) lt lv) as [ lv Hfor2 ].
induction lt as [ | t lt IH ]; intros lv Hfor2.
inversion Hfor2 as [ | Ba v Bc lv' Be Hfor2' Bg Bh ]; subst.
induction lv as [ | v lv IH ].
induction v as [ c lv ] using value_ind2.
intros Himp; destruct Himp as [ v Himp ]; destruct v; discriminate.
Fixpoint vars_of_term (t : term) : list variable := match t with | var x => [x] | capply _ lt => flat_map vars_of_term lt | fapply _ lt => flat_map vars_of_term lt end.
Fixpoint vars_of_pattern (p : pattern) : list variable := match p with | p_var x => [x] | p_capply _ lp => flat_map vars_of_pattern lp end.
Lemma vars_of_pattern_term p : vars_of_pattern p = vars_of_term (term_from_pattern p).
induction p as [x | c lp IH] using pattern_ind2; simpl; trivial.
Fixpoint functions_of_term (t:term) : list function := match t with | var _ => [] | capply _ lt => flat_map functions_of_term lt | fapply f lt => f :: flat_map functions_of_term lt end.
Fixpoint fapplies_in_term (t: term) : list term := match t with | var _ => [] | capply _ lt => flat_map fapplies_in_term lt | fapply _ lt => t :: flat_map fapplies_in_term lt end.
Lemma fapplies_in_term_are_fapplies t1 t2 : In t1 (fapplies_in_term t2) -> exists f lt, t1 = fapply f lt.
induction t2 as [ x | c lt IH | f lt IH ] using term_ind2; intros t1 Hin; simpl in Hin; try tauto.
destruct (IH t Hinlt t1 Hinfapp) as (f' & lt' & Heq).
exists f; exists lt; symmetry; assumption.
destruct (IH t Hinlt t1 Hinfapp) as (f' & lt' & Heq).
induction v as [ c lv IH ] using value_ind2.
rewrite <- flat_map_comp with (h := fun x => fapplies_in_term (@term_from_value x)); trivial.
induction lv as [ | v' lv' IH' ]; trivial.
Fixpoint max_arity_pattern (p : pattern) : nat := match p with | p_var _ => 0 | p_capply _ lp => max (length lp) (maxl (map max_arity_pattern lp)) end.

Fixpoint max_arity_term (t : term) : nat := match t with | var _ => 0 | capply _ lt => max (length lt) (maxl (map max_arity_term lt)) | fapply _ lt => max (length lt) (maxl (map max_arity_term lt)) end.
Definition max_arity_rule (r : rule) : nat := match r with | rule_intro _ lp t => max (max_arity_term t) (max (length lp) (maxl (map max_arity_pattern lp))) end.
Definition max_arity_prog (prog : list rule) : nat := maxl (map max_arity_rule prog).
Definition rule_vars_defined (r : rule) : Prop := match r with | rule_intro _ lp t => incl (vars_of_term t) (flat_map vars_of_pattern lp) end.
Definition wf_prog (prog : list rule) : Prop := andl (map rule_vars_defined prog) /\ max_arity_prog prog <= max_arity.
Fixpoint subst (s : variable -> value)(t : term) : term := match t with | var x => s x | capply c lt => capply c (map (subst s) lt) | fapply f lt => fapply f (map (subst s) lt) end.
Fixpoint psubst (s : variable -> value)(p : pattern) : value := match p with | p_var x => s x | p_capply c lp => c_capply c (map (psubst s) lp) end.
Lemma subst_not_var : forall s t x, ~ subst s t = var x.
intros s t x; destruct t; simpl; try congruence; apply term_from_value_not_var.
Lemma subst_psubst s p : subst s (term_from_pattern p) = term_from_value (psubst s p).
induction p as [ x | c lp IH1 ] using pattern_ind2; simpl; trivial.
f_equal; do 2 rewrite map_map; revert IH1; clear; intro IH1; induction lp as [ | p lp IH2]; simpl; trivial.
Fixpoint value_size (v : value) : nat := match v with | c_capply _ lv => 1 + suml (map value_size lv) end.
Fixpoint term_size (t : term) := match t with | var _ => 1 | capply _ lt => 1 + suml (map term_size lt) | fapply _ lt => 1 + suml (map term_size lt) end.
case t; intros ; simpl; apply gt_Sn_O.
Lemma in_capply_term_size_lt c (t : term) lt : In t lt -> term_size t < term_size (capply c lt).
induction lt as [ | t' lt IH ]; simpl; try tauto.
Lemma in_fapply_term_size_lt f (t : term) lt : In t lt -> term_size t < term_size (fapply f lt).
induction lt as [ | t' lt IH ]; simpl; try tauto.
Definition rhs_of_rule (r : rule) : term := match r with rule_intro _ _ t => t end.
Definition lhs_of_rule (r : rule) : term := match r with rule_intro f lp _ => fapply f (map term_from_pattern lp) end.
Definition max_rhs (prog : list rule) : nat := maxl (map term_size (map rhs_of_rule prog)).
Lemma compatible_sizes: forall v, term_size (term_from_value v) = value_size v.
induction v as [c lv IH] using value_ind2; simpl; do 2 f_equal; rewrite map_map; apply map_in_ext; trivial.
Definition max_size_image_subst (t : term) (s : variable -> value) : nat := maxl (map value_size (map s (vars_of_term t))).
Lemma incl_le_max_size_image_subst : forall s t u, incl (vars_of_term t) (vars_of_term u) -> max_size_image_subst t s <= max_size_image_subst u s.
destruct H_size_in_var_t as [ var [ H_var_size H_var_in_t ] ].
set (var_size := fun x : variable => value_size (s x)).
Lemma step_one: forall s t, term_size (subst s t) <= term_size t * (1 + max_size_image_subst t s).
intros s t; induction t as [ x | c lt IH | f lt IH ] using term_ind2.
unfold max_size_image_subst; simpl; rewrite plus_0_r; rewrite compatible_sizes; apply le_S; apply le_max_l.
apply le_n_S; rewrite map_map; apply suml_map_le; apply IH.
clear IH; apply le_n_S; induction lt as [ | t lt IH ]; simpl; trivial; etransitivity.
clear IH; unfold max_size_image_subst; simpl; do 2 rewrite map_app; rewrite maxl_app.
set (w := term_size t); set (x:= maxl (map value_size (map s (vars_of_term t)))); set (y:= maxl (map value_size (map s (flat_map vars_of_term lt)))); set (z := suml (map term_size lt)).
replace (max x y + (w + z) * S (max x y)) with (w * S (max x y) + (max x y + z * S (max x y))).
apply mult_le_compat_l; apply le_n_S; apply le_max_r.
apply le_n_S; rewrite map_map; apply suml_map_le; apply IH.
clear IH; apply le_n_S; induction lt as [ | t lt IH ]; simpl; trivial; etransitivity.
clear IH; unfold max_size_image_subst; simpl; do 2 rewrite map_app; rewrite maxl_app.
set (w := term_size t); set (x:= maxl (map value_size (map s (vars_of_term t)))); set (y:= maxl (map value_size (map s (flat_map vars_of_term lt)))); set (z := suml (map term_size lt)).
replace (max x y + (w + z) * S (max x y)) with (w * S (max x y) + (max x y + z * S (max x y))).
apply mult_le_compat_l; apply le_n_S; apply le_max_r.
Lemma size_subst_var_le_size_value: forall p s (x:variable) v, v = psubst s p -> In x (vars_of_pattern p) -> value_size (s x) <= value_size v.
induction p as [ x' | c lp IH ] using pattern_ind2 ; intros v H_match H_x_in_pattern.
destruct H_x_in_pattern as [ p [ H_p_in_lp H_x_in_p ] ].
instantiate (1 := map (fun x0 : pattern => value_size (psubst s x0)) lp).
Lemma max_size_image_subst_bounded : forall t s, max_size_image_subst t s <= term_size (subst s t).

intros t s; unfold max_size_image_subst; rewrite map_map; induction t as [ x | c lt IH | f lt IH ] using term_ind2; simpl; try (rewrite max_0_r; rewrite compatible_sizes; trivial); (transitivity (suml (map term_size (map (subst s) lt))); [idtac | apply le_n_Sn]); rewrite map_map; apply maxl_le_suml_map; exact IH.
Definition activation_bound (prog : list rule) : nat -> nat := fun x => max_rhs prog * (1 + x).
Lemma activation_bound_monotone (prog : list rule) : forall x y, x <= y -> activation_bound prog x <= activation_bound prog y.
Definition nb_rhs_functions (r: rule) := match r with | rule_intro _ _ t => length (functions_of_term t) end.
Definition max_nb_rhs_functions (prog : list rule) : nat := maxl (map nb_rhs_functions prog).
induction p using pattern_ind2; simpl; auto.
induction l; simpl in *; try (now exfalso).
Lemma no_funcs_in_patterns l: flat_map functions_of_term (map term_from_pattern l) = [].

command: fix H1 6; intros P Q H2 H3 H4 [c l]; apply H4; revert l; fix H5 1; intros [ | v l].
fix H1 8; intros P Q H2 H3 H4 H5 H6 [ x | c l | f l ].
apply H5; revert l; fix H7 1; intros [ | t l].
apply H6; revert l; fix H7 1; intros [ | t l].
intros P H1 H2 H3 t.
apply term_ind2_gen with (Q := fun l => forall t, In t l -> P t); simpl; try tauto.
clear H1 H2 H3 t; intros t1 l H1 H2 t2 [H3 | H3].
fix H1 7; intros P Q H2 H3 H4 H5 [ x | c l ].
apply H5; revert l; fix H6 1; intros [ | p l].
apply pattern_ind2_gen with (Q := fun l => forall p, In p l -> P p); simpl; try tauto.
clear H1 H2 p; intros p1 l H1 H2 p2 [H3 | H3].
split; intro H; destruct (variable_eq_dec x1 x2); [ trivial | discriminate | trivial | tauto ].
split; intro H; destruct (function_eq_dec x1 x2); [ trivial | discriminate | trivial | tauto ].
split; intro H; destruct (constructor_eq_dec x1 x2); [ trivial | discriminate | trivial | tauto ].
apply value_ind2_gen with (Q := fun l => forall v, In v l -> P v); simpl; try tauto.
clear H1 v; intros v1 l H1 H2 v2 [H3 | H3].
induction v1 as [ c1 lv1 IH ] using value_ind2; simpl; intros [ c2 lv2 ].
induction t1 as [ x1 | c1 lt1 IH | f1 lt1 IH ] using term_ind2; simpl; intros [ x2 | c2 lt2 | f2 lt2 ]; try (split; congruence).
intros v x; destruct v; simpl; congruence.
intros v x; destruct v; simpl; congruence.
revert v'; induction v as [ c lv IH ] using value_ind2; intros v' Heq.
revert lv' Heqlv Hlen IH; induction lv as [ | v lv IH' ]; intros lv' Heqlv Hlen IH; destruct lv' as [ | v' lv']; [ trivial | inversion Hlen | inversion Hlen | ].
intros v x; destruct v; simpl; congruence.
induction t as [ | c lt IH | ] using term_ind2.
intros Himp; destruct Himp as [ v Himp ]; destruct v; discriminate.
assert (exists lv, Forall2 (fun t v => t = term_from_value v) lt lv) as [ lv Hfor2 ].
induction lt as [ | t lt IH ]; intros lv Hfor2.
inversion Hfor2 as [ | Ba v Bc lv' Be Hfor2' Bg Bh ]; subst.
induction lv as [ | v lv IH ].
induction v as [ c lv ] using value_ind2.
intros Himp; destruct Himp as [ v Himp ]; destruct v; discriminate.
induction p as [x | c lp IH] using pattern_ind2; simpl; trivial.
induction t2 as [ x | c lt IH | f lt IH ] using term_ind2; intros t1 Hin; simpl in Hin; try tauto.
destruct (IH t Hinlt t1 Hinfapp) as (f' & lt' & Heq).
exists f; exists lt; symmetry; assumption.
destruct (IH t Hinlt t1 Hinfapp) as (f' & lt' & Heq).
induction v as [ c lv IH ] using value_ind2.
rewrite <- flat_map_comp with (h := fun x => fapplies_in_term (@term_from_value x)); trivial.
induction lv as [ | v' lv' IH' ]; trivial.
intros s t x; destruct t; simpl; try congruence; apply term_from_value_not_var.
induction p as [ x | c lp IH1 ] using pattern_ind2; simpl; trivial.
f_equal; do 2 rewrite map_map; revert IH1; clear; intro IH1; induction lp as [ | p lp IH2]; simpl; trivial.
case t; intros ; simpl; apply gt_Sn_O.
induction lt as [ | t' lt IH ]; simpl; try tauto.
induction lt as [ | t' lt IH ]; simpl; try tauto.
induction v as [c lv IH] using value_ind2; simpl; do 2 f_equal; rewrite map_map; apply map_in_ext; trivial.
destruct H_size_in_var_t as [ var [ H_var_size H_var_in_t ] ].
set (var_size := fun x : variable => value_size (s x)).

intros t s; unfold max_size_image_subst; rewrite map_map; induction t as [ x | c lt IH | f lt IH ] using term_ind2; simpl; try (rewrite max_0_r; rewrite compatible_sizes; trivial); (transitivity (suml (map term_size (map (subst s) lt))); [idtac | apply le_n_Sn]); rewrite map_map; apply maxl_le_suml_map; exact IH.
induction p using pattern_ind2; simpl; auto.
induction l; simpl in *; try (now exfalso).
